name: monkeytype
title: Monkeytype
description: Quick access to Monkeytype sections - typing tests, stats, leaderboards, and settings
author: radouane-tamouss

commands.name: index
commands.title: Open Monkeytype
commands.subtitle: Typing Test
commands.description: Quick access to Monkeytype sections - typing tests, stats, leaderboards, and settings

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
